doc.field: Print matter. Emergency Response Guidebook, 2012. Various anniversary booklets: Columbia Association 81st; FDNY 150th; Asian-American Council 31st; Chiefs Association 100th; Engine 8 150th; Ladder 20 125th; 1966 23rd street fire 50th and earlier. FDNY Foundation Dinner awards, 2016. Technical material: NYC Citywide Incident Management System manual, 2005; "Practical approaches to Firefighting", 1985; Great American Insurance reprint on construction; 2 copies of Popular Science, Jan 1947, with fire engines and article; children's book on firemen (1950s); binder of articles on fire fatalities (Hackensack and Charleston). Spadafora's personal "Probationary FF Notebook, 9/2/78-10/6/78." CDs: 23rd St Memorial, FDNY War Years 2, New York Fire College history, FDNY class of 1978 30th reunion. (Includes digital formats)
